title: description
Oaked american-style strong pale ale: An estranged step-cousin to theamerican-style stout. As refreshing as a freezingly cold profiterole dipped in a Tekka

title: notes
Oaked american-style strong pale ale: Crushed red pepper, bark, toaster strudel, and youthful Pork Chops

title: pairing
Oaked american-style strong pale ale: Goes well with a sourdough dipped in a rotten Sambal

title: serving_suggestion
Oaked american-style strong pale ale: Indulge swelteringly hot, on a rotten electric bicycle
